attributes.action: Insist that those who caused his credit crunch make themselves accountable!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If anyone out there is worried about repossession then read on...
The financial institutes of the country are wholly responsible for the credit crisis and the uncertain future we are facing.  They have risked our money and our livelihoods for their greater gain.  Now they should be made accountable.
The Labour Government should INSIST that the financial institutes of this country take some of the responsibility for, and stand by, their actions and not allow them to repossess peoples homes and investments until such time in the future that we are out the other side of this crisis.
If you think the Labour Government should stand up to the financial institutes in this way then please sign this petition.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
